body: Should i do it? what are your opinions

title: Youtube?

replies.body: First of all you need a good mic and recording program
replies.body_tagged: First of all you need a good mic and recording program

replies.body:
If you are good at commentary, you should do it.
Also, you should have a decent microphone, decent recording software (I recommend fraps).
replies.body_tagged:
If you are good at commentary, you should do it.
Also, you should have a decent microphone, decent recording software (I recommend fraps).

replies.body: Good PC, Good mic, Good commentary, Good content, Good Personality... Yes :)
replies.body_tagged: Good PC, Good mic, Good commentary, Good content, Good Personality... Yes :)

replies.body:

Be sure to do commentary with other people, lone youtubers are pretty boring

replies.body: Make sure to start with something unique. DO NOT do what other Tubers do. Do something like Nebula, CTH, etc.
replies.body_tagged: Make sure to start with something unique. DO NOT do what other Tubers do. Do something like Nebula, CTH, etc.

replies.body: On that note, I think it would be appropriate to ask, would anyone like to join me in commentary?
replies.body_tagged: On that note, I think it would be appropriate to ask, would anyone like to join me in commentary?
